website.name: HorizonWing
website.title: HorizonWing - AI-Powered Business Solutions & Digital Innovation
website.description: Transform your business with HorizonWing's AI solutions. Streamline operations, boost productivity, and drive innovation with our cutting-edge technology.

Footer.description: HorizonWing is a modern, open-source landing page template built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, helping developers create beautiful websites faster.

Feature.title: Key Features
Feature.description: A modern landing page template built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn, and TypeScript
Feature.openSourceDesc: Free and open source, perfect for your next project
Feature.ResponsiveDesignDesc: Looks great on any device, from mobile to desktop
Feature.EasyCustomizationDesc: Simple to customize with modular components
Feature.MobileFriendlyDesc: Optimized for mobile devices with smooth interactions
Feature.SEOOptimizedDesc: Built with SEO best practices for better visibility

Testimonial.title: What Users Say About HorizonWing
Testimonial.description: See what developers and creators think about our landing page template.
Testimonial.quoteOne: HorizonWing is incredibly well-structured. The code is clean and the documentation is excellent.
Testimonial.quoteTwo: The internationalization support is fantastic. Saved me hours of work on localization.
Testimonial.quoteThree: Best landing page template I've used. SEO optimization really helped our site ranking.
Testimonial.quoteFour: The responsive design works perfectly across all devices. Very impressed with the attention to detail.
Testimonial.quoteFive: Customization is super easy. We adapted it to our brand in no time.
Testimonial.quoteSix: The mobile-first approach and performance optimizations are exactly what we needed.

Faq.title: Common Questions
Faq.description: Everything you need to know about HorizonWing landing page template
Faq.answerOne: HorizonWing is built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and other modern tools. It uses best practices for performance and SEO.
Faq.answerTwo: Yes! The template is highly modular and well-documented. You can easily modify components, styles, and content to match your brand.
Faq.answerThree: We use next-intl for internationalization, making it easy to add new languages. Just add your translations to the messages folder.
Faq.questionFour: Can I use it for commercial projects?
Faq.answerFour: Absolutely! HorizonWing is open-source and free to use for both personal and commercial projects.
Faq.answerFive: Basic knowledge of React and Tailwind CSS is helpful, but our documentation makes it easy even for beginners.

Cta.title: Start Building Your Landing Page Today

Hero.description: This is a free, open-source and powerful landing page template for saas project, it will help you to make your startup faster.
